DOC.brief_summary: The investigator test hypothesis alveolar recruitment maneuver cesarean section woman general anesthesia improve lung compliance gas exchange . The investigator apply recruitment maneuver positive end expiratory pressure ( PEEP ) 8 cmH2O . The maximum alveolar pressure limit ( Ppeak ) 45 cmH2O recruitment maneuver . The primary end point study improvement lung compliance measure volume difference/pressure difference ( dv/dp ) ml/cmH2O
DOC.brief_title: Alveolar Recruitment Maneuver During Cesarean Section Improves Lung Compliance
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator use recruitment maneuver cesarean section woman general anesthesia . The primary end point study improvement lung compliance measure volume difference/pressure difference ( dv/dp ) ml/cmH2O recruitment maneuver . The investigator use 2 group patient . In first group investigator use pressure control ventilation recruitment maneuver . After ventilator switch pressure control mode investigator increase inspiratory time 50 % inspiratory pressure Positive End Expiratory Pressure ( Ppeak ) 20 cmH2O . Then investigator progressively increase Positive End Expiratory Pressure ( PEEP ) peak inspiratory pressure ( Ppeak ) 45 cm H2O . The whole recruitment maneuver last 2 minute . After recruitment maneuver investigator use volume control ventilation ( baseline setting ) PEEP step wised decreased 8 cmH20but . PEEP ( 8cmH2O ) leave end operation . In second group investigator use lung recruitment maneuver . In group lung compliance measure ( dynamic static ) dv/dp ( ml/cmH2O ) . Measures assess 1 minute delivery ( recruitment ) , 3 minute recruitment ( first group ) 10 20 minute recruitment . The investigator also measure Ppeak ( cmH2O ) Pplateau ( cmH2O ) inspiratory pressure , blood pressure ( mmHG ) , beat per minute , oxygen saturation , end-tidal CO2 accord time frame , blood Gases 3 minute recruitment etc .
DOC.criteria: general anesthesia , hemodynamically stable intracranial hypertension , pulmonary hypertension , low blood pressure ( MBP < 80 mmHg ) , Heart rate > 100 beats/min , patient refusal
DOC.keyword: Lung recruitment , cesarean , lung compliance , atelectasis
